t:
My uncle came to visit us.
Last night he came to my room when everyone was asleep and unbuttoned my shirt.



He started touching me, his fingers tracing the bruises in my body. He asked, “How long have your parents been beating you?”
c:
Then he unbuckled his belt.



#uncle #fear #different #parents #torture #helpless #abuse #bruises





This story is based on many 'abused by uncle' incidents, with a little bit of twist.
